Package spritz

The core elements of the Spritz library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccumulatorFunction<Input,Output>  
    Cancelable
    Interface identifying a resource that can be cancelled.
    EventEmitter<T>
    Interface for elements that can emit events.
    SourceCreator<T>  
    SpritzTestUtil.Logger
    Interface to intercept log messages emitted by runtime.
    Subscriber<T>  
    Subscription  
    SuccessivePredicate<T>
    Functional interface for determining whether an item should be skipped based on last emitted item.
    TimeoutForItemFn<T>
    Functional interface for determining timeout for particular item.
    UncaughtErrorHandler
    Interface defining handler invoked when an unexpected error occurs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectableStream<T>  
    Scheduler
    The scheduler is responsible for scheduling and executing tasks asynchronously.
    Spritz
    Provide access to global configuration settings.
    SpritzTestUtil
    Utility class for interacting with Spritz config settings in tests.
    Stream<T>  
    Subject<T>  
    VirtualProcessorUnit
    Processing unit responsible for executing tasks.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TimeoutException
